pr_title: Use cached states when validating block gossip

timeline.message: Use Store.getStateAtSlot when getting the state to validate a block against instead of processing slots manually.

timeline.bodyText: while we're here, is it worth including block root in the messages for context?
timeline.author: rolfyone

replies.bodyText: It's a trace level message so I'm not worried about it - mostly useful when a test is failing and you need to know why your block is being rejected.
replies.author: ajsutton
